https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/9HDLsZVWtGFRrXv9FMYMgfIFySk.jpg A Marine veteran working as a school janitor tries to mend his relationship with his son after a divorce. When his son is killed by a police officer found innocent without standing trial, he takes matters into his own hands. American Skin
